item.title: about_gardening
item.description: Welcome to the garden. It’s a bit haunted, but it still wont grow itself!

item.title: Brin's Notes:The Common Toad
item.description: General Notes I have read Orwells classics – Animal Farm & 1984 Most of the mentioned authors and books are alien to me, my context comes from purely reading the book My ability to analyse literature is very amature The Common Toad His thoughts on the “need” to be in the nature remind me a lot of what I read/know so far about Walden.

item.title: The Bookclub
item.description: In the book club we read books! Current bookclub schedule: The Common Toad, George Orwell (1946) – 2022.07.04 Brin’s Notes We Had To Remove This Post, Hanna Bervoets (2022)

item.title: The Gardeners Guide to the Haunted Garden
item.description: This garden needs tending, otherwise the ghosts will get scared and wont show themselves. Right now, to get started with your gardening tools, please contact Ghost of Brin.

item.title: The Zine Workshop
item.description: Prepare a zine for Jen about how to make zines! A ghost’s guide to astrology a haunted crossword puzzle frog and toadification of ghosts
